title: About Scholarship In Pes
content: How Much I have To Score In order to get 40% scholarship And % of students Getting It In pes

comments.body:
Every department's top x% (x=20 for my batch, might have changed now) gets 40% of their fees back.  There is no way to say "how much" you need to score, since it depends on how the batch performs. If you are in CS, then usually crossing an 8.8 is enough to guarantee this scholarship. 

There is another scholarship where branch toppers with the highest CGPA get more returns, but I have forgotten the %. So maybe someone else can fill in here.

The top 10% gets MRD which is 50% of your fees back, the next 15% gets CNR which is 40% of your fees back. And then there's DAC, everybody above 7.75 SGPA gets 1000 rupees.
